pullrequest.title: Plotting utility GUI - Plot window, canvas, variables

content.raw:
I'll just add a note here that this PR has changed the style for all push buttons in Gazebo. I hadn't noticed that before, I think it should be fine. The size of some buttons became a bit odd though.

![newbuttons.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/1143604614-newbuttons.png)

![newbuttons2.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/1388319754-newbuttons2.png)

![newbuttons3.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/3301353569-newbuttons3.png)
content.html: I'll just add a note here that this PR has changed the style for all push buttons in Gazebo. I hadn't noticed that before, I think it should be fine. The size of some buttons became a bit odd though.
